summary: Scale beyond canary: small standard run with batch limits, automated checksums, and export manifest.

directives.details: Set max_alfa_per_batch=8; document parameters used for this run (template version, toggles).
Produce standard batches under configured limit with telemetry enabled.
Emit composite_export.json/csv with build_info.json and SHA256 checksums; generate export_manifest.json summarizing artifacts + checksums.
Record export locations and checksums in report; ensure paths are accessible to consumers.
Submit run summary to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-020-report.json with counts, checksums, and any anomalies.
